Detailed Description

This class must be inherited by every class which implement a concrete e-puck interface. It's a abstract class only, and can't be instanced.
Author:
Renato Florentino Garcia
Date:
August 2008

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum EpuckInterface::Request [protected]

Enumerator:
CONFIG_CAMERA  Send configurations for camera initialization.
SET_VEL  Send motors steps per second velocity.
GET_STEPS  Receive the steps made and reset the stepp counter.
STOP_MOTORS  Stop the motors.
GET_IR_PROX  Receive the IR sensors readings.
GET_CAMERA_IMG  Receive an image from camera.
SET_LED_POWER  Send the state of all LEDs.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

EpuckInterface::EpuckInterface ( const SerialPort *const   serialPort  )  [protected]

Parameters:
serialPort Pointer for a SerialPort class already created and connected with an e-puck.

Member Data Documentation

const SerialPort* const EpuckInterface::serialPort [protected]

This pointer points to the only instance of SerialPort Class. Each interface will be this pointer pointed to the same instance.
